name: Aladdin Ali
title: Software engineer (backend-first) who likes making complex systems feel simple
about: I’m a backend-first software engineer who’s happiest when a system is both reliable and easy to work in.
Most of my work is in C#/.NET—building APIs, automation, and data-heavy services, often in environments where auditability and uptime matter.
I also enjoy the product side of things: turning messy requirements into a clean UI, solid workflows, and a codebase a team can confidently extend.
buildingNow: A small suite of tools that make audits and debugging easier, plus a clean web shell for shipping polished side projects.
